abilities.name: Particle Grenade
abilities.description: Launch a particle grenade that deals 71 damage to enemies within the area. Deals 50% damage to Structures. Stores up to 4 charges.

abilities.name: Personal Barrier
abilities.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 560 damage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Shield Ally
abilities.description: Grants an allied Hero a Shield that absorbs 420 damage for 3 seconds.

heroics.name: Graviton Surge
heroics.description: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

heroics.name: Expulsion Zone
heroics.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

original.name: Zarya
original.title: Defender of Russia
original.description: Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women and was a promising athlete, but all that changed when the Siberian omnium reawakened. As a soldier in the Russian Defense Force, she now proudly uses her strength to protect the ones she loves.
original.shortDescription: A Bruiser that can enable deadly allies and is good at preventing burst damage.

baseHeroInfo.name: Zarya
baseHeroInfo.title: Defender of Russia
baseHeroInfo.description: Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women and was a promising athlete, but all that changed when the Siberian omnium reawakened. As a soldier in the Russian Defense Force, she now proudly uses her strength to protect the ones she loves.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Bruiser that can enable deadly allies and is good at preventing burst damage.

trait.name: Energy
trait.description: Each time Zarya's Personal Barrier or Shield Ally absorbs 9 damage, her Energy is increased by 1. Each point of Energy increases Zarya's damage by 2%. After 0.5 seconds, Energy decays by 3 per second.

skins.name: Defender of Russia
skins.description: Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women and was a promising athlete, but all that changed when the Siberian omnium reawakened. As a soldier in the Russian Defense Force, she now proudly uses her strength to protect the ones she loves.

skins.name: High Gravity Zarya
skins.description: The Tobelstein Reactor is an emergent technology, and its full potential has yet to be tapped. Rumor has it that the Gravitic Harness is the next great advancement in energy projection.

skins.name: Cyberdemon Zarya
skins.description: Reverse engineered from Overwatch's cyberization techniques, the Jigoku battle armor offers most of the benefits of cybernetic augmentation without requiring invasive surgery.

skins.name: Thunder Guard Zarya
skins.description: Armed with their Mjolnir Cannons, Zarya Aleksdottir and the Thunder Guard serve as the Midgard megalopolis' last defense against the Jotunheim Republic and their frost golem army.
